message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you want to be fair Alice, but this money depreciates quickly for me. This is my counter offer.
The rate is going up, Bob. I need a better deal than last round to make it worthwhile for both of us.
The clock is ticking Alice, and we both lose if this fails.  Meet me in the middle?
I understand the time pressure Bob, but fairness is important too. This is my final offer.
